contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of September, 2010, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. Appellant’s complaint is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Fayette County. See Hill v. Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection, 545 Pa. 38, 679 A.2d 773, 774 n. 1 (1996).
